Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kimball/Bloomingdale
ShortDescription: Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temp. rerouted via Homan, Armitage, Central Park, North Avenue, & Homan, due to street blockage near Kimball/Bloomingdale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Armitage, Central Park, North Avenue, & Homan, due to street blockage near Kimball/Bloomingdale.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
